document_data.name: Hall of Pools and Mirrors
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of Pools and Mirrors''' was a shrine dedicated to [[Savras]] located within [[Candlekeep]].
document_data.Location: The shrine was hidden within the Inner Rooms where the most powerful magical [[tome]]s were stored within Candlekeep.
document_data.Description: The Hall was lined with many magical and nonmagical scrying devices. Three of the [[crystal ball]]s were actually [[crystalich]]es.
